title: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Spin-off: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Bakuen wo!
original_name: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！スピンオフ この素晴らしい世界に爆焔を！
sinopse: A spin-off of Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! that focuses on Megumin and Yunyun taking place before their respective appearances in the main series.
